channel.title: Client ip
channel.description:
Hello,
for my server im trying to edit out a client
its a client that auto-matically connects to a certain ip
can anyone give me a few tips on how to find this in the client files and change the ip to my servers ip??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 12, 2009, 10:12:46 am[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Client ip
item.dc:creator: @KrisGreen KrisGreen
item.description:
@KrisGreen wrote:

if your having trouble search “43594” or “ip” once you found the files open them and search “ip” again there ip should show up , edit it out with yours

Read full topic

item.title: Client ip
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

Go to the “GUI” in your client’s folder and search for “Serverip” and change that to whatever your ip is.

Read full topic
